name: Total number of people aged 15+ with no education (millions) (IIASA (2015))
description:
No education includes Illiterates and persons who have never attended school; persons who were attending 1st grade of primary education at time of survey; persons attending adult literacy courses at time of survey; and khalwa (first level of traditional Koranic schools).

No education corresponds to the following International Standard Classification of Education (ISCED 1997) Levels: No Level or Level 0; grade 1 of Level 1 not completed.

For ISCED 1997 definitions see: https://web.archive.org/web/20220131215732/https://uis.unesco.org/sites/default/files/documents/international-standard-classification-of-education-1997-en_0.pdf
datasetName: Population Dynamics and Global Human Capital - IIASA (2015)

source.name: International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA): World Population and Human Capital in the Twenty-First Century (2015)
source.dataPublisherSource: Lutz, Wolfgang, William P. Butz, and Samir (2014) World population and human capital in the twenty-first century. Oxford: Oxford University Press.
source.additionalInfo: The data on past and projected rates of educational attainment comes from the International Institute for Applied Systems Analysis (IIASA) and can be found here. These projections are constructed using current Global Economic Trends (GET). There are other scenarios available, including a best and worst case.
